name: Webcruzer
tag_list: free-websites, ecommerce, shopping-carts, payment-systems, ecommerce-websites, free-ecommerce-websites, free-ecommerce, do-it-yourself-websites, free-web-hosting, business-websites
overview:
Webcruzer is a multilingual global Internet Business Solutions provider and has been created and designed to allow all businesses globally to build their own professional website, for â‚¬160 in 30 minutes. These websites comprise features such as shopping cart and online payment system, and can be built by anyone with basic computer skills, without downloading any software. All Webcruzer websites are hosted free. Users can also conduct Auctions, Classifieds, Blogs, Forums plus much more, within a Webcruzer website, free.

Webcruzer offers a number of global services which include:

â€¢ WEBSITES Webcruzer provides global website solutions for businesses and individuals. Webcruzerâ€™s website solutions provide you with Product/Service Catalogue, Shopping Cart, Batch Product Uploading/Downloading, Smart Email Marketing, Real Time Credit/Debit Card Transactions, Blogs and Forums, Free Hosting, Free Email, Order Reporting, Free Global Directory Listing, Website Statistics, Auction and Classified Linking, 1000â€™s of Website Design Variations and more. Webcruzer provides you with a Free domain name for your website, however you can also link your existing domain name to your Webcruzer website, should you have one.

â€¢ AUCTIONS Webcruzer provides a Global online Auction facility which is free to use by all. Auctions can be placed in any language supported by Webcruzer and viewed by users speaking any other language supported by Webcruzer. The Webcruzer Auction facility will soon comprise a global online Payment System rivaling PayPal, to allow all Auction sellers and buyers to transact between each other at little cost.

â€¢ CLASSIFIEDS Webcruzer provides a Global online Classified facility which is free to use by all. Classifieds can be placed in any language supported by Webcruzer and viewed by users speaking any other languages supported by Webcruzer. Webcruzerâ€™s Classified facility is in direct competition with every classified site around the world today, whether it be car classifieds, property classifieds, job classifieds or dating classifieds, Webcruzer now allows anyone to list and search every type of classified, world-wide, for Free. The Webcruzer Classified facility will soon comprise a global online Payment System rivaling PayPal, to allow all Classified sellers and buyers to transact between each other at little cost.

â€¢ DIRECTORY Webcruzer provides a free online Business Directory in over 4,000 categories and 1,400 cities worldwide. All businesses and individuals can list themselves in the category and city of their choice within the Webcruzer directory, Free. The directory also allows Priority Listings to be place in all cities, states and countries, for those businesses really keen to be seen.

â€¢ AFFILIATE PROGRAM Webcruzerâ€™s Affiliate Program gives anyone the opportunity to earn an ongoing income, by allowing you to take control of all the products and solutions offered by Webcruzer and provide them to your current clients and/or establish and grow a new customer network of companies, businesses and individuals worldwide. It is Free to become a Webcruzer Affiliate, Affiliates earn ongoing commissions on website sales of up to 45% of the gross income year one and up to 22% every year thereafter.

Webcruzer offers 2 types of Affiliate registrations. â€¢ One being a Website Affiliate, where any individual or company registers a website with Webcruzer and joins the Website Affiliate Program. â€¢ Second being a Webcruzer Banner Affiliate, whereby an individual or company registers as a Webcruzer Banner Affiliate, and then promotes Webcruzer via placing a Webcruzer banner on their own and/or other websites. While this opportunity is also Free, it is not available online and is available by invitation only.
